component.name: deleteTweet
component.description: Delete a Tweet when given the Tweet ID.

component.name: getLikedTweetsList
component.description: Retrieves a list of liked Tweets of the specified user ID.

component.name: searchTweets
component.description: Retrieves a collection of tweets that meet the specified search criteria.

component.name: getTweetById
component.description: Retrieves information about a single Tweet specified by the requested ID.

component.name: getTweetsLookup
component.description: Retrieves information about one or more Tweets specified by the requested IDs.

component.name: getUserHomeTimeline
component.description: Retrieves a collection of most recent Tweets and Retweets posted by you and users you follow. This endpoint can return every Tweet created on a timeline over the last 7 days as well as the most recent 800 regardless of creation date.

component.name: getUserMentionsTimeline
component.description: Retrieves Tweets mentioning a single user specified by the requested user ID. By default, the most recent ten Tweets are returned per request. Using pagination, up to the most recent 800 Tweets can be retrieved.

component.name: getUserTweetsTimeline
component.description: Retrieves Tweets composed by a single user, specified by the requested user ID. By default, the most recent ten Tweets are returned per request. Using pagination, the most recent 3,200 Tweets can be retrieved.

component.name: likeTweet
component.description: Allows a user to like a Tweet.

component.name: unlikeTweet
component.description: Allows a user to unlike a Tweet that was previously liked.
